conbody.p: An additional window displaying the video will open during video playback in the media player ( ).

fig.title: Media player with the Video playback window

image.alt: Media player with the Video playback window

conbody.p: Right click on the Video playback window and select a value from the pop-up menu to resize the video ( ). The window will be automatically resized to fit the video.
Double click on the video playback window to reset video size back to 100%. A second double click will restore size of the video to the value set via the pop-up menu.
